answerText: Bessemer process[10] The patio process used mule-powered devices called arrastras to process ores of this metal by forming a mercury amalgamation. The Washoe process was an improvement on pan amalgamation for recovering this element.
heading: NASAT |2014 | 1 | 5 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Name some important advances in metallurgy [10] The Thomas-Gilchrist converter improved on this process by using a basic lining instead of an acidic one. In this process, air is blown through pig iron to remove impurities and create steel.
